pictures.description: with Cambridge and the MIT Green Building (designed by I.M. Pei) in the background
pictures.title: People lying on the esplanade

pictures.description: A beautiful day along the Charles River Esplanade.  The MIT Great Dome can be seen in the background, along with a pretty construction crane.
pictures.title: Charles River and MIT Great Dome

pictures.description: This picture was taken from the Cambridge side of the Charles River.  You can see the city of Boston in the background.
pictures.title: Naked Sailboats in the Sunset

pictures.description: MIT campus and sailboats in the background.
pictures.title: Man sitting on bench - Charles River Esplanade

pictures.description: Look at how green it is in the springtime!
pictures.title: Benches on the Charles River Esplanade

pictures.description: Beyond the Charles River, there is Cambridge on the left, Boston on the right, and the Longfellow Bridge connecting the two in the center.
pictures.title: Biker on Esplanade Platform

pictures.description: John Hancock Building on the left and Prudential Tower on the right
pictures.title: Esplanade with Boston in the Background

pictures.description: The Boston Marathon is a great excuse for people to get drunk during the daytime ('cause nobody has to go to work on Patriots' Day weekend), so the Captain does his part to help.
pictures.title: Captain Morgan at the Boston Marathon

pictures.description: Lots of these folks are probably drunk ...
pictures.title: People on Boylston Watching Boston Marathon

pictures.description: Check out the Matrix-looking guy next to the TV camera stand.  Of course, my favorite building, the John Hancock Tower in the background, as well as flags of many countries lining the street near the finish line.
pictures.title: Near the Boston Marathon Finish Line

pictures.description: About 1 mile left until the finish.  People running near the Citgo sign in Boston.
pictures.title: 1 Mile from Boston Marathon Finish Line

pictures.description: About 1 mile left until the finish.  People running near the Citgo sign in Boston.  Some are so pooped by this time that they are walking.
pictures.title: Boston Marathon Runners

pictures.description: About 1 mile left until the finish.  John Hancock and Prudential towers in the distant background.
pictures.title: Boston Marathon Runners (again)

pictures.description: I snapped this candid shot of a boy playing with pigeons when I was walking through Boston Common.
pictures.title: Motion Commotion

pictures.description: A beautiful day in the Boston Common park.
He could be a hobo, but maybe not.  He's got dirty socks, though.
pictures.title: Jesus-like guy in Boston common

pictures.description: A little girl lined up with a mother duck and her ducklings in Boston Common.
pictures.title: Duck, Duck, Duck ...
